about_the_game:
Kingdom of Atham: Crown of the Champions

Embark on an immersive medieval fantasy survival odyssey where every decision shapes your destiny. Reclaim the stolen Crown and face the malevolent Shadowbringers.

Crafting Mastery:
Forge your legacy with an intricate crafting system. Create powerful weapons, enchanted armor, and essential tools. Customize your gear to suit your playstyle and enhance your chances of survival.

Skills and Abilities:
Hone your skills as you progress. Choose from diverse skills, specializing in combat, magic, summoning dragons and more or crafting. Evolve your character, adapting to new challenges and unlocking unique abilities and weapons to become the ultimate champion of Atham.



Mystical Magic:
Unleash the arcane with a rich magic system. Learn spells, harness elemental powers, and master the art of enchanting weapons. Magic is your key to overcoming adversaries and unveiling the secrets hidden within Atham.

Treacherous Dungeons:
Challenge your mettle in intricately designed dungeons. Face formidable guardians, and collect various items along your journey. Each dungeon is a unique trial that will test your wits, combat skills, and courage.



Diverse Lands:
Explore the diverse landscapes of Atham, from the desolate ruins of Minorith to the enchanting Al'Math Forest. Each land presents its own challenges, creatures, and secrets. Traverse the Plains of Bastonia, The deserted Lake Town, Ir'aloks Mountains, and beyond, each with its own unique charm and danger.

Epic Quests:
Embark on epic quests guided by the wise Great Elder Osimodius. Uncover the lore of Atham, make moral decisions, and shape the kingdom's fate. The narrative unfolds as you progress, with twists and turns that keep you engaged in the rich tapestry of this fantasy realm.



Building Strongholds:
Survival demands strategic thinking. Build and fortify strongholds to withstand the encroaching darkness. Customize your stronghold, manage resources, and create a home base where you can prepare for your next great adventure.

Become the True Champion:
Only the bravest will prevail in the Kingdom of Atham. Will you rise as the true champion, vanquish the Shadowbringers, and restore light to this mystical realm? Your journey awaits, adventurer. The fate of Atham rests in your hands.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core I5-7600 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: (Low Settings) SSD Recommended. Requirement are higher during EA development, Performance will be improved overtime!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i7 9700k or AMD Ryzen 7 3700x or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2080 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
